name: gallberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a North American evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves) with leaves like leather and black berries (= small, round fruits) : Inkberry, or gallberry, is an evergreen holly, and does well on drier soils. The gallberries restricted the view much more than I expected. Gallberry bushes dominated the landscape.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bench was half-hidden behind gallberry and palmetto.Gallberry fruits are eaten by a variety of birds, including wild turkey and quail.Light filtered through the leaves, allowing thickets of shrubs such as saw palmetto and gallberry to grow.
